## What you will learn this week

* Simple exponential smoothing
* Corresponding ETS models

## Pre-class activities

Read [Sections 8.1-8.4 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos

## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial)

Complete Exercises 1-6, 8, 11-12 from [Section 5.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox-exercises.html).

[**Solutions to Exercises**](ex5-sol.qmd)
